amendment.description: Amendment sought to change the calculation of toll credits by basing them on the proportion of non-Federal investment in toll projects.
amendment.purpose: An amendment numbered 4 printed in part B of House Report 108-456 to allow states to receive toll credits for any local, state or private funds contributed to a toll project that exceeds the minimum non-federal 20% threshold required for federal match.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Jackson-Lee (TX) amendment (A004) Failed by recorded vote: 50 - 376 (Roll no. 107).
